header.title: Simal Theme
header.abstract: This theme is used by the Simal project. It provides a theme optimised for use in project catalogues.

section.title: Configuration
section.p: To use this theme you need to do the following (the plugin documentation object provides examples of all the files with the correct configuration):
Include the dispatcher plugins in your forrest.properties file
Include the doap plugin in your forrest.properties file
Set dispatcher.themer to equal uk.ac.osswatch.forrest.themes in your project locationmap.
